definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

definition: not distinguishing red-green or black-white (idiom)/not to distinguish between right and wrong
pinyin: bu4 wen4 qing1 hong2 zao4 bai2

definition: the rights and wrongs of a matter (idiom)
not distinguishing black or white (idiom); not to distinguish between right and wrong
cow and famous steed at the same trough (idiom); fig. the common and the great are treated alike

sentences.english: Objective Discuss the anti-fatigue action of pseudo-ginsenoside GQ.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨伪人参皂苷GQ抗运动性疲劳的功效。

sentences.english: She had the sweet scent of my lavender soap.
sentences.chinese: 她身上还留有我那块薰衣草皂的香甜的味道。

sentences.english: Strong soaps can strip oil from your skin.
sentences.chinese: 强力皂能够强力洗去你皮肤中的油分。

sentences.english: Conclusion Ginsenoside can prevent or delay the development of hypertrophy.
sentences.chinese: 结论人参皂苷在早期能预防或延缓心肌肥大的发生。

sentences.english: Conclusion Pseudo-ginsenoside CQ showed fairly strong function of anti-fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 结论伪人参皂苷GQ显示出较强的抗疲劳作用。

sentences.english: Determination of Gastrodine Content in Tianma Formula Granule by HPLC;
sentences.chinese: 目的建立理中汤配方颗粒中人参皂苷的含量测定方法。

sentences.english: The basis of further development and utilization of saponin from Japanese ginseng(Panax japonicum)was provided.
sentences.chinese: 为竹节参皂苷进一步开发利用提供依据。

sentences.english: The color of soap from Gromwell Root Infused Oil.
sentences.chinese: 皂的颜色效果来自紫草根浸泡油。

sentences.english: Objective To establish characteristic spectrum of ginsenosides in Panax quinquefolium from Liuba.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立留坝西洋参药材皂苷成分的特征图谱。

sentences.english: Objective To establish the determination method of ginsenoside content in Lizhongtang compatible granule.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立理中汤配方颗粒中人参皂苷的含量测定方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of Ginsenoside on function and structure of diaphragm in diabetic rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究人参皂苷对糖尿病大鼠膈肌功能的保护作用。

sentences.english: The 100% coconut oil soap is a perfect household soap.
sentences.chinese: 这100%椰油家事皂一直是婆婆妈妈的最爱。

sentences.english: Soaps of metals heavier than sodium are not very soluble;
sentences.chinese: 金属皂比钠重，可溶性不高。

sentences.english: Effective liquid soap with fresh and cool foam leaves a pleasant smell.
sentences.chinese: 高效液体皂，泡沫清爽留余香。

sentences.english: "The soap has helped my son's eczema"- T. Leckie, Wattle downs.
sentences.chinese: 这款皂帮助了我儿子的湿疹。
